short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run advanced analytics to identify data types, nulls, outliers, probability distribution, multi correlations and much more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You need high quality data to generate high quality results.

Identify nulls, format (types) or outliers. This tool also goes one step beyond by evaluating distributions and correlations allowing to save time and resources to data enthusiasts.
